Posts.Content: kootiekat2000 wrote: My name is Lisa and breast cancer does not run in my family but various other forms do.  I recently started having shooting pains in the side of my right breast that is very painful and sometimes lingering.  I have done breast self exams before and have never felt anything. Well after this pain started I did one and felt a little mass.  I did some research before I registered here and I never came accross anything that said pain was involved with detecting cancer.  Can someone please assist me with my question....Should I be worried about the pain in my breast or am I maybe just straining a muscle?  Is there pain in first symptoms of cancer? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: young and worried kootiekat2000 kimbly
